verses.verse: וַיְצַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> commanded מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְזִקְנֵ֣י <S%H2205><s%> with the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying שָׁמֹר֙ <S%H8104><s%> Keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <S%H4687><s%> all the commandments אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֛י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> which I command אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> you this day

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> shall be on בַּיּוֹם֮ <S%H3117><s%> And it shall be on the day אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> when תַּעַבְר֣וּ <S%H5674><s%> when ye shall pass over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לָ֑ךְ וַהֲקֵמֹתָ֤ <S%H6965><s%> thee that thou shalt set thee up לְךָ֙ אֲבָנִ֣ים <S%H68><s%> stones גְּדֹל֔וֹת <S%H1419><s%> great וְשַׂדְתָּ֥ <S%H7874><s%> and plaister אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בַּשִּֽׂיד׃ <S%H7874><s%> and coat

וְכָתַבְתָּ֣ <S%H3789><s%> And thou shalt write עֲלֵיהֶ֗ן <S%H5921><s%> and אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֛י <S%H1697><s%> upon them all the words הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> of this law הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> you בְּעָבְרֶ֑ךָ <S%H5674><s%> when thou art passed over לְמַ֡עַן <S%H4616><s%> so אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which תָּבֹ֨א <S%H935><s%> that thou mayest go in אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאָ֜רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the land אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֣יךָ ׀ <S%H430><s%> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> giveth לְךָ֗ אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> thee a land זָבַ֤ת <S%H2100><s%> that floweth חָלָב֙ <S%H2461><s%> with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <S%H1706><s%> and honey כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> hath promised יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> of thy fathers לָֽךְ׃

וְהָיָה֮ <S%H1961><s%> become בְּעָבְרְכֶ֣ם <S%H5674><s%> Therefore it shall be when ye be gone over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּן֒ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan תָּקִ֜ימוּ <S%H6965><s%> [that] ye shall set up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאֲבָנִ֣ים <S%H68><s%> these stones הָאֵ֗לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> as אָנֹכִ֜י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> which I command אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> you this day בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> in mount עֵיבָ֑ל <S%H5858><s%> Ebal וְשַׂדְתָּ֥ <S%H7874><s%> them with plaister אוֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> בַּשִּֽׂיד׃ <S%H7874><s%> shall coat

וּבָנִ֤יתָ <S%H1129><s%> And there shalt thou build שָּׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there מִזְבֵּ֔חַ <S%H4196><s%> an altar לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God מִזְבַּ֣ח <S%H4196><s%> an altar אֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> of stones לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תָנִ֥יף <S%H5130><s%> thou shalt not lift up עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and בַּרְזֶֽל׃ <S%H1270><s%> [any] iron

אֲבָנִ֤ים <S%H68><s%> stones שְׁלֵמוֹת֙ <S%H8003><s%> of whole תִּבְנֶ֔ה <S%H1129><s%> Thou shalt build אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִזְבַּ֖ח <S%H4196><s%> the altar יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְהַעֲלִ֤יתָ <S%H5927><s%> and thou shalt offer עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> on עוֹלֹ֔ת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> thereon unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

וְזָבַחְתָּ֥ <S%H2076><s%> And thou shalt offer שְׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> peace offerings וְאָכַ֣לְתָּ <S%H398><s%> and shalt eat שָּׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְשָׂ֣מַחְתָּ֔ <S%H8055><s%> there and rejoice לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

וְכָתַבְתָּ֣ <S%H3789><s%> And thou shalt write עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָאֲבָנִ֗ים <S%H68><s%> upon the stones אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֛י <S%H1697><s%> all the words הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> of this law הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise בַּאֵ֥ר <S%H874><s%> plainly הֵיטֵֽב׃ <S%H3190><s%> very ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <S%H3548><s%> and the priests הַלְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites אֶ֥ל <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> unto all Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַסְכֵּ֤ת ׀ <S%H5535><s%> Take heed וּשְׁמַע֙ <S%H8085><s%> and hearken יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> O Israel הַיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> This נִהְיֵ֣יתָֽ <S%H1961><s%> thou art become לְעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H430><s%> thy God

וְשָׁ֣מַעְתָּ֔ <S%H8085><s%> Thou shalt therefore obey בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וְעָשִׂ֤יתָ <S%H6213><s%> and do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִצְוֹתָו֙ <S%H4687><s%> his commandments וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקָּ֔יו <S%H2706><s%> and his statutes אֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> which אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <S%H6680><s%> which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> thee this day ס

וַיְצַ֤ו <S%H6680><s%> charged מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> the people בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day הַה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אֵ֠לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these יַֽעַמְד֞וּ <S%H5975><s%> These shall stand לְבָרֵ֤ךְ <S%H1288><s%> to bless אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> the people עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> upon mount גְּרִזִ֔ים <S%H1630><s%> Gerizim בְּעָבְרְכֶ֖ם <S%H5674><s%> when ye are come over אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan שִׁמְעוֹן֙ <S%H8095><s%> Simeon וְלֵוִ֣י <S%H3878><s%> and Levi וִֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> and Judah וְיִשָּׂשכָ֖ר <S%H3485><s%> and Issachar וְיוֹסֵ֥ף <S%H3130><s%> and Joseph וּבִנְיָמִֽן׃ <S%H1144><s%> and Benjamin

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these יַֽעַמְד֥וּ <S%H5975><s%> And these shall stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> For הַקְּלָלָ֖ה <S%H7045><s%> to curse בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> upon mount עֵיבָ֑ל <S%H5858><s%> Ebal רְאוּבֵן֙ <S%H7205><s%> Reuben גָּ֣ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad וְאָשֵׁ֔ר <S%H836><s%> and Asher וּזְבוּלֻ֖ן <S%H2074><s%> and Zebulun דָּ֥ן <S%H1835><s%> Dan וְנַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <S%H5321><s%> and Naphtali

וְעָנ֣וּ <S%H6030><s%> shall speak הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> And the Levites וְאָֽמְר֛וּ <S%H559><s%> and say אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> unto all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice רָֽם׃ <S%H7311><s%> with a loud ס

אָר֣וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed הָאִ֡ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [be] the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יַעֲשֶׂה֩ <S%H6213><s%> that maketh פֶ֨סֶל <S%H6459><s%> [any] graven וּמַסֵּכָ֜ה <S%H4541><s%> or molten image תּוֹעֲבַ֣ת <S%H8441><s%> an abomination יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD מַעֲשֵׂ֛ה <S%H4639><s%> the work יְדֵ֥י <S%H3027><s%> of the hands חָרָ֖שׁ <S%H2796><s%> of the craftsman וְשָׂ֣ם <S%H7760><s%> and putteth בַּסָּ֑תֶר <S%H5643><s%> [it] in [a] secret וְעָנ֧וּ <S%H6030><s%> shall answer כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָעָ֛ם <S%H5971><s%> [place] And all the people וְאָמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> and say אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed מַקְלֶ֥ה <S%H7034><s%> [be] he that setteth light אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> by his father וְאִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> or his mother וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed מַסִּ֖יג <S%H5253><s%> [be] he that removeth גְּב֣וּל <S%H1366><s%> landmark רֵעֵ֑הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour's וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed מַשְׁגֶּ֥ה <S%H7686><s%> to wander עִוֵּ֖ר <S%H5787><s%> [be] he that maketh the blind בַּדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> out of the way וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen ס

אָר֗וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed מַטֶּ֛ה <S%H5186><s%> [be] he that perverteth מִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> the judgment גֵּר־ <S%H1616><s%> of the stranger יָת֖וֹם <S%H3490><s%> fatherless וְאַלְמָנָ֑ה <S%H490><s%> and widow וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen ס

אָר֗וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed שֹׁכֵב֙ <S%H7901><s%> [be] he that lieth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֵ֣שֶׁת <S%H802><s%> wife אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> with his father's כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because גִלָּ֖ה <S%H1540><s%> because he uncovereth כְּנַ֣ף <S%H3671><s%> skirt אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father's וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed שֹׁכֵ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> [be] he that lieth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any בְּהֵמָ֑ה <S%H929><s%> with any manner of beast וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> any הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen ס

אָר֗וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed שֹׁכֵב֙ <S%H7901><s%> [be] he that lieth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲחֹת֔וֹ <S%H269><s%> with his sister בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> of his father א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> or the daughter אִמּ֑וֹ <S%H517><s%> of his mother וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed שֹׁכֵ֖ב <S%H7901><s%> [be] he that lieth עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> in חֹֽתַנְתּ֑וֹ <S%H2859><s%> with his mother in law וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen ס

אָר֕וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed מַכֵּ֥ה <S%H5221><s%> [be] he that smiteth רֵעֵ֖הוּ <S%H7453><s%> his neighbour בַּסָּ֑תֶר <S%H5643><s%> secretly וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen ס

אָרוּר֙ <S%H779><s%> Cursed לֹקֵ֣חַ <S%H3947><s%> [be] he that taketh שֹׁ֔חַד <S%H7810><s%> reward לְהַכּ֥וֹת <S%H5221><s%> to slay נֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> any דָּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> bloodshed נָקִ֑י <S%H5355><s%> an innocent וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen ס

אָר֗וּר <S%H779><s%> Cursed אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not יָקִ֛ים <S%H6965><s%> [be] he that confirmeth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> not [all] the words הַתּוֹרָֽה־ <S%H8451><s%> of this law הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> by לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to do אוֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> them And all the people אָמֵֽן׃ <S%H543><s%> Amen פ
